data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cicchino, Armando C., González-Acuña, Daniel Alfonso (2012): Species in the genus Bonomiella Conci, 1942 (Phthiraptera: Menoponidae) from Argentina and Chile. Zootaxa 3427: 47-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212897
